name: Arugula Salad
description: Light and refreshing arugula salad packed with flavor, tossed in lemon vinaigrette. It is the best simple side salad, lunch or dinner!
ingredients: ¼ cups white wine vinegar (can substitute red)
2 tablespoons lemon juice freshly squeezed or store bought
instructions: In a small bowl with a whisk or jar sealed tight, combine vinegar, olive oil and lemon juice. Add pepper to taste. Wash and spin the arugula and add to medium mixing bowl. Toss with vinaigrette. Top with fresh grated parmesan.
